name: kosma batalo
description:
Far away in a reality where Esperanto is spoken by all...

The ship's computer is bizarre at best. It can only perform one task at a time and you don't have any say in which one'll pop up next. I guess that's why it's called a H.O.P.E. (Hyper-galactic Optimism Powered Engine). Be patient and wait for the move you need, then PRESS THE BUTTON!

At least we have a HOP teleportation system, I guess. Be warned, though, its haunted old tech can sometimes glitch and produce a ghost-ship, blindly following echos of your own moves. These ghost ships have no body but their laser-bolts are very real!

Watch out for those asteroids, too!

Menu:
Press a button* to select Single Player or Versus mode
Press and hold a button* to start the game

Game:
Press and hold a button* to execute the control shown on the control dice

* buttons
Left player: LShift, LCtrl, LAlt, spacebar, mouse-button, Controller1 button etc
Right player: RShift, RCtrl, RAlt, Controller2 button etc
Single player: any of the above
